Description: Monsoon rains led to flooding in several parts of Pune.
Intense rainfall resulted in waterlogging and disrupted transportation.
Protests and strikes disrupted normal life and transportation in the city.
Pune faced a major outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic
A major industrial fire led to evacuations and air quality concerns.
An extreme heatwave with temperatures exceeding 45Â°C affected the city.
Heavy monsoon rains caused significant flooding in parts of Pune.
A landslide in the hilly areas disrupted traffic and caused damage.
A moderate earthquake with a magnitude of 4.8 rattled the city.
A sudden hailstorm caused damage to crops and vehicles in Pune.
